loading.translation[0].definitions[0].de: an amount of money added to the cost of an insurance policy or other financial product to pay for the cost of managing the policy, loan, etc
loading.translation[0].definitions[1].de: when goods are put onto a road vehicle, train, boat, or plane to be transported
loading.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The goods are brought here for loading.
It is one of the main Black Sea loading ports.
